Class DependenciesRegistry

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class DependenciesRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for adding dependencies.

    • Field Detail

      • dependenciesMap

        public static java.util.Map<IAdvancedModRegister,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dependenciesMap
        The dependencies that have been registered. Key is the register, value is the list of modid dependencies for the key.

      • libDependenciesMap

        public static java.util.Map<IAdvancedModRegister,java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>>> libDependenciesMap
        Library dependencies. The second map is keyed by library id, and valued by the minimum version of the library.

        public static final void addDependency(IAdvancedModRegister register,

        Adds a single dependency.
        Parameters:
        register - The register that will have the dependency.

      • addDependencies

        public static final void addDependencies(IAdvancedModRegister register,
                   java.lang.String... dependencies)
        Adds a group of dependencies at once.
        Parameters:
        register - The register that will have the dependencies.
        dependencies - The dependencies to register.

      • addLibDependency

        public static final void addLibDependency(IAdvancedModRegister register,
                    java.lang.String libId,
                    java.lang.String minLibVersion)
        Adds a library dependency.
        Parameters:
        register - The register that will have the dependency.
        libId - The modid of the library dependency.
        minLibVersion - The minimum version the library dependency has to be.

      • doesRegisterHaveDependencies

        public static final boolean doesRegisterHaveDependencies(IAdvancedModRegister register)
        Gets whether or not the specified register has any dependencies.
        Parameters:
        register - The register to check.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the specified register has any dependencies.

      • checkDependencies

        @MPIAnnotations.Internal
public static final boolean checkDependencies(IAdvancedModRegister registerToCheck)
        Checks the dependencies of the specified register.
        Parameters:
        registerToCheck - The mod register to check the dependencies of.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the dependencies check was fully completed.
